changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `${table.prefix}social_dingtalk_app` ( `id` bigint unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT 'primary key', `suite_id` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT 'suite id', `suite_secret` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT 'suite secret', `agent_id` varchar(30) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT 'app agent id', `token` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT 'token', `aes_key` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT 'aes key', `app_type` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT 'application type (1: self, 2: isv)', `auth_corp_id` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'self-agent app authorization corp id', `suite_ticket` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'suite ticket for self-agent app', `is_deleted` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'deleted (0:no,1:yes)', `created_by` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'creator', `updated_by` bigint DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'last modified by', `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'creation time', `updated_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'update time', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE, UNIQUE KEY `uk_suite_id` (`suite_id`) USING BTREE, KEY `idx_agent_id` (`agent_id`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='Social- Dingtalk application Table';
